html:
Doom and gloom
With a promise of sunshine
That’s what crows say
That’s what wolves know
And the forests sing
While the swamps stink
It’s becoming obvious
It is coming to you
And The Sirius shines
While people live and die
The Planet spins
In an epic dance
Doom and gloom
With a promise of sunshine
This is what I do
This is who I am
title: Gloom
